page.title: 18HEALTH CENTRE WICKERSLEY
page.content: {Wickersley Health Centre}was planned in 1971 and built in 1981 at a cost of {Â£304,000.}In the centre there are 4 groups of 4 doctors each doctor having his own room.As well as doctors surgeries there are 5 health visitors, 2 Midwives and 6 District Nurses,who deal with people who do not need to go to hospital. In addition there is also a clinical psychologist,a psychiatrist a chiropodist and 2 speech therapists. Other facilities include family planning evenings,relaxation classes for pregnant women and a dads evening 1 evening per month. The school nurse and doctor are also based at the centre and school medicals are held,1 Monday every month.On the site there is also a chemist,to save time getting prescriptions.
